item.title: Bitcoin Price Losing The Highs
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Losing The Highs

Bitcoin price wasted more time below resistance, today, as the bulls bought into an assumed rally. Indeed, a rally is possible, but the exchanges have more to gain from pulling price down into liquidation than giving small fish retail traders what they explicitly want. This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay.

item.title: Russian Official Calls for Criminal Liability for Bitcoin
item.description:
Russian Official Calls for Criminal Liability for Bitcoin

Russia's Investigative Committee Chairman Alexander Bastrykin has, once again, opined that virtual and cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin are money substitutes or surrogates that need to be outlawed. He also claimed that virtual currencies are "often used" for the financing of terrorism.

item.title: Dodgy Dave Cameron Gets on Fintech Bandwagon. Bitcoin As Ultimate Offshore?
item.description:
Dodgy Dave Cameron Gets on Fintech Bandwagon. Bitcoin As Ultimate Offshore?

"Dodgy Dave" as he was referred to by Dennis Skinner in the parliament recently has been in the eye of the limelight for his father's Panama-based UK tax avoidance fund. Details of this fund were revealed in the Panama Papers leak and David Cameron has since then accepted that he benefitted from the sale of these funds before he entered office.

item.title: LRB 路 John Lanchester 路 When Bitcoin Grows Up: What is Money?
item.description:
LRB 路 John Lanchester 路 When Bitcoin Grows Up: What is Money?

It's impossible to discuss new developments in money without thinking for a moment about what money is. The best place to start thinking about that is with money itself. Consider the UK's most common paper money, the English five or ten or twenty quid note. On one side we have a famous .

item.title: Can OpenBazaar ever be browser based? I feel a huge hurdle to success is the need to download software. * /r/Bitcoin
item.description:
Can OpenBazaar ever be browser based? I feel a huge hurdle to success is the need to download software. * /r/Bitcoin

Thoughts? Thanks for your help.

item.title: How to Prove You're Bitcoin Creator Satoshi Nakamoto
item.description:
How to Prove You're Bitcoin Creator Satoshi Nakamoto

Four months have passed since the world learned the name of Craig Wright, a man who, as WIRED wrote in December, either created Bitcoin or very badly wants someone to believe he did. Now rumors are swirling through the Bitcoin world that Wright himself is poised to publicly claim-and possibly offer some sort of proof-that he really is Satoshi Nakamoto, the mysterious inventor of Bitcoin.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 04/18/2016 - Rising Wedge Spotted! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 04/18/2016 - Rising Wedge Spotted! - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price has been trading inside a rising wedge pattern as bullish pressure is present but weakening. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price has been trading inside a rising wedge pattern as bullish pressure is present but weakening. Technical Indicators Signals Bitcoin price has been trending higher on the 4-hour time frame, showing higher lows and higher highs.

item.title: Bitcoin trading platform, Coinsecure, raises $ 1.2 mn
item.description:
Bitcoin trading platform, Coinsecure, raises $ 1.2 mn

Coinsecure, the domestic Bitcoin trading platform, has raised $1.2 million as part of its ongoing 'Series A' investment round. The company opened the fund-raising round earlier in January and expects to close the round soon, an official statement said.
